message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. With that said, I'm willing to make a strong opening offer of $900000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm willing to negotiate from here.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I am interested in making a counteroffer that respects both the value of the product and my budget. My proposed price is $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I believe it's a reasonable compromise.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I've given it careful consideration, and I'd like to propose a price of $860000. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $870000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's worth to me.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $865000. I hope this offer is within your range and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement. However, I'm still not willing to go below $880000. This is the minimum I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm willing to sell the product to you for $882500. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice. I understand your position, and I've considered all factors. I would like to propose a price of $875000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $885000. This is the minimum I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm willing to sell the product to you for $887500. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice. I understand your position, and I've considered all factors. I would like to propose a price of $880000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
